snippet: The tone of private discussions between Britain and other members of the European Union about Brexit has improved since earlier this year, British finance minister Philip Hammond said on Sunday....

headline.main: Rescue Helicopter Crashes in Central Japan; At Least 3 Dead
headline.print_headline: Rescue Helicopter Crashes in Central Japan; At Least 3 Dead

lead_paragraph: The tone of private discussions between Britain and other members of the European Union about Brexit has improved since earlier this year, British finance minister Philip Hammond said on Sunday.
